languages.text: "Вольному Торговцу стоило бы предать пиратский корабль очистительному огню. Даже обломок с этого судна может нести скверну!"

traits.locale_text: "Вольному Торговцу стоило бы предать пиратский корабль очистительному огню. Даже обломок с этого судна может нести скверну!"

languages.text: "The Rogue Trader should have purged the pirate vessel with fire. Even a fragment of a ship like that could become a carrier of corruption!"

languages.text: 「ローグトレーダーは、あの海賊船を炎で浄化すべきだったんだ。あんな船の断片でさえ、汚染を運ぶ媒介になり得るからね！」
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader should have purged the pirate vessel with fire. Even a fragment of a ship like that could become a carrier of corruption!"

traits.locale_text: 「ローグトレーダーは、あの海賊船を炎で浄化すべきだったんだ。あんな船の断片でさえ、汚染を運ぶ媒介になり得るからね！」

languages.text: "{mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} hätte das Piratenschiff durch Feuer läutern sollen. Selbst der kleinste Splitter eines solchen Schiffes könnte Verderbnis übertragen!"
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader should have purged the pirate vessel with fire. Even a fragment of a ship like that could become a carrier of corruption!"

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} hätte das Piratenschiff durch Feuer läutern sollen. Selbst der kleinste Splitter eines solchen Schiffes könnte Verderbnis übertragen!"

languages.text: « {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} aurait dû purifier le vaisseau pirate par le feu. Il suffirait d'un simple fragment d'un tel appareil pour transmettre la corruption ! »
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader should have purged the pirate vessel with fire. Even a fragment of a ship like that could become a carrier of corruption!"

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} aurait dû purifier le vaisseau pirate par le feu. Il suffirait d'un simple fragment d'un tel appareil pour transmettre la corruption ! »

languages.text: «{mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente debería haber purgado el navío pirata a sangre y fuego. ¡Hasta un fragmento de una nave como esa podría contagiar su corrupción!».
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader should have purged the pirate vessel with fire. Even a fragment of a ship like that could become a carrier of corruption!"

traits.locale_text: «{mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente debería haber purgado el navío pirata a sangre y fuego. ¡Hasta un fragmento de una nave como esa podría contagiar su corrupción!».

languages.text: “行商浪人应当用净化的烈焰，让这艘海盗船灰飞烟灭。因为即便是它的碎片，也可能会成为腐化的媒介！”
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader should have purged the pirate vessel with fire. Even a fragment of a ship like that could become a carrier of corruption!"

traits.locale_text: “行商浪人应当用净化的烈焰，让这艘海盗船灰飞烟灭。因为即便是它的碎片，也可能会成为腐化的媒介！”

languages.text: "Hür Tacir o korsan gemisini ateşe vermeliydi. O geminin her bir parçasından yozlaşma fışkırıyordur!"
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader should have purged the pirate vessel with fire. Even a fragment of a ship like that could become a carrier of corruption!"

traits.locale_text: "Hür Tacir, o korsan gemisini ateşe vermeliydi. O geminin tek bir parçasından bile yozlaşma fışkırıyordur!"
